summary: A woman in a hypnotic state recounts to two doctors the details of a horrific experience from her past life that began with the mysterious and sudden disappearance of her husband.
cast: Beverly Garland|Bruce Bennett|Lon Chaney Jr.|George Macready|Frieda Inescort|Richard Crane|Douglas Kennedy|Bill Bradley|Hal K. Dawson|Dudley Dickerson|John Frederick|Ruby Goodwin|Ken Kane|Boyd Stockman|Vince Townsend Jr.|Lee Warren
